C

ChainedCounterModel - Class in <Unnamed>
A class which inherits from CounterModel with overriding increment method Makes sure that when a counter reaches modulus, the next time value increases by 1
ChainedCounterModel(int, int, CounterInterface) - Constructor for class ChainedCounterModel
Constructor which sets modulus with superclass' constructor and sav Takes starting value as a parameter and sets it accordingly
changeValue(CounterModel) - Static method in class TestCounter
Changes value of counter
CounterModel - Class in <Unnamed>
Class which is a model for a counter
CounterModel() - Constructor for class CounterModel
Constructor which initializes a new counter with standard modulus value and increases number of counters by 1
CounterModel(int) - Constructor for class CounterModel
Constructor which initializes a new counter with modulus according to argument Increases number of counters by 1

D

decrement() - Method in class CounterModel
Method which decreases counter value by 1 with consideration to modulus If less than 0, value becomes max(modulus) value-1
downMany() - Method in class FastCounter
Decreases value by 1 [steps] times

E

equals(Object) - Method in class CounterModel
Compares classes and current value between Object and counter
equals(Object) - Method in class FastCounter
Compares [steps] range and information from superclass between Object and counter

F

FastCounter - Class in <Unnamed>
Class used to increase/decrease based on number of steps
FastCounter() - Constructor for class FastCounter
Constructor which initializes a new counter with standard modulus and steps values
FastCounter(int, int) - Constructor for class FastCounter
Constructor which initializes a new counter with modulus and steps values according to arguments

I

increment() - Method in class ChainedCounterModel
Overriding method of superclass CounterModel If counter is reset, next counter is increased by 1

Method which increases counter value by 1 with consideration to modulus

M

Tests increment, decrement, reset, equals and getValue and prints results

R
